name: Blasteroids! (chryslenne)
description:
Instructions:

  • Space Bar - Move Forward
  • Mouse Movement - Ship's Rotation
  • Mouse 1 (LMB) - Fire Weapon

A LAN party game, where you blast your friends into the void...

Developers:

  • Arin (https://twitter.com/YorBoyBlue)- Integrate Networking to all GameObjects; Player User Interface; Minimap
  • Tariq (https://twitter.com/bluemonkey1111) - Level Manager; Asteroid Split Effect; Game Sprites
  • Nestor (https://twitter.com/chryslenne ) - Laser particle effect; Basic Ship Movements; Modified Game Sprites
